CmdLine: apk update --no-cache && apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps     build-base     autoconf     zlib-dev     libxml2-dev
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apk add --no-cache         git         zip         libzip-dev         libjpeg-turbo-dev         freetype-dev         libpng-dev         imagemagick-dev         jpegoptim         optipng         pngquant         gifsicle         && ln -snf /usr/share/zoneinfo/$TZ /etc/localtime && echo $TZ > /etc/timezone         && docker-php-ext-configure         zip --with-libzip         && docker-php-ext-configure         gd --with-gd             --with-jpeg-dir=/usr/include             --with-png-dir=/usr/include             --with-freetype-dir=/usr/include         && docker-php-ext-install         zip         pdo         bcmath         pdo_mysql         exif         mysqli         mbstring         pcntl         dom         gd         && pecl install -o -f         redis         imagick         && docker-php-ext-enable         redis         imagick         && apk del --no-network .build-deps     && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*
Commands.Name: run
